hero.title: HEWAN'S EVENT
hero.subtitle: YOUR VISION. YOUR STYLE. YOUR DAY

hero.title: EXCEPTIONAL EVENT SERVICES IN STOCKHOLM
hero.subtitle: We offer a wide range of services for all types of events. We specialize in creating memorable parties, weddings, conferences, memorials, dinners and events. No matter what type of event you are planning, we will customize every detail to your specific needs to make your stay with us truly unique.

wedding.title: Marriage & Weddings
wedding.description: Complete wedding planning and coordination services to make your special day perfect and unforgettable.

festivities.title: Festivities & Events
festivities.description: Professional event planning for celebrations, parties, and special occasions with attention to every detail.

conference.title: Conferences & Meetings
conference.description: Corporate event planning including conferences, meetings, and business gatherings with professional service.

memorials.title: Memorials & Funerals
memorials.description: Compassionate and dignified memorial services and funeral arrangements with cultural sensitivity.

catering.title: Catering Services
catering.description: Exquisite culinary experiences with custom menus, professional service, and beautiful presentation.

christmas.title: Christmas Parties
christmas.description: Festive holiday celebrations and Christmas parties with traditional and modern touches.

exhibitions.title: Mini Fairs & Exhibitions
exhibitions.description: Small-scale exhibitions, trade fairs, and showcase events with professional setup and management.

wellness.title: Wellness Events
wellness.description: Mindfulness, wellness, and health-focused events promoting well-being and relaxation.

summer.title: Summer Parties
summer.description: Outdoor summer celebrations, garden parties, and seasonal events with vibrant atmosphere.

ceremonies.title: Ceremonies & Receptions
ceremonies.description: Formal ceremonies, award events, and elegant receptions with protocol and tradition.

venues.title: Venue Rental
venues.description: Beautiful venue spaces for rent with full service options and flexible arrangements.

cta.title: Can't find exactly what you're looking for?
cta.subtitle: Don't worry! Contact us anyway, and we'll tailor a solution to suit your needs. Every event with us is unique, and we look forward to helping you create unforgettable memories in Stockholm.

weddingStats.title: IT TAKES ABOUT 500 HOURS TO PLAN A WEDDING...

hero.subtitle: Creating Unforgettable Moments with Elegance and Precision

story.title: Our Story
story.description1: Hewan's Event was born from a passion for creating extraordinary celebrations that honor cultural traditions while embracing modern elegance. Founded in Stockholm, we have grown into one of the city's most trusted event planning and catering services.
story.description2: Since our inception, we have specialized in transforming visions into reality, whether it's an intimate wedding ceremony, a grand corporate conference, or a heartfelt memorial service. Our multicultural approach allows us to serve diverse communities with authenticity and respect.
story.description3: Every event we create tells a unique story, reflecting the personalities, traditions, and dreams of our clients. We believe that the most memorable moments are born from careful attention to detail and genuine understanding of what matters most to you.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide everything we do

passion.title: Passion
passion.description: We pour our hearts into every event, treating each celebration as if it were our own special day.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We maintain the highest standards in every aspect of our service, from planning to execution.

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.description: We work closely with our clients, vendors, and venues to ensure seamless coordination.

creativity.title: Creativity
creativity.description: We bring fresh ideas and innovative solutions to make your event truly one-of-a-kind.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.subtitle: The passionate professionals behind every unforgettable event

first.name: Hewan Selam
first.description: With over a decade of experience in event planning, Hewan brings artistic vision and cultural sensitivity to every celebration.

second.name: Aida Tekle
second.description: Aida ensures every detail is perfectly executed, coordinating vendors and timelines with precision and grace.

third.name: Makeda Haile
third.description: Makeda transforms spaces into breathtaking venues with her exceptional eye for design and color.

fourth.name: Samuel Tesfaye
fourth.description: Samuel oversees all logistical aspects, ensuring smooth operations and timely delivery of services.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.quote: To create extraordinary moments that celebrate life's most precious occasions with cultural authenticity, creative excellence, and heartfelt attention to detail.

cta.title: Ready to Create Something Beautiful?
cta.description: Let's bring your vision to life. Whether you're planning an intimate gathering or a grand celebration, we're here to make it extraordinary.
